title: Stranger Things: Jim Hopper alive as car spotted on season 4 set?
text:
Stranger Things fans reckon Hopper will be making an appearance in season four (Picture: Netflix)

Stranger Things fans reckon Jim Hopper is definitely still alive and well after spying his car on the set of season four.

The police officer, played by David Harbour, was last seen being trapped in the Upside Down at the end of the most recent Netflix series, with the character’s fate remaining completely shrouded in mystery.

Since then, theories have been circulating that Hopper is the American that had been captured and imprisoned by the USSR in the post-credits scene and now it seems more than likely that the hero will be returning for the show’s next chapter thanks to a behind-the-scenes photo.

According to a picture shared on Reddit, filming for the fourth installment is already underway and Hopper’s 1980 Chevrolet Blazer has been spotted on location in Georgia, United States.

A Reddit user captured a pic of Hopper’s car on set (Picture: ChihuahuaWithBoombox)

A number of cars from the series were photographed (Picture: ChihuahuaWithBoombox)

The original poster, ChihuahuawithBoombox, shared a number of pics of the motor surrounded by members of crew and also revealed how they attempted to take a snap next to Hopper’s vehicle.

Unsurprisingly, diehard fans are convinced this means that the copper will be returning to screens, with one writing: ‘So there’s Hopper’s truck. He’ll be back. Good.’

‘That’s definitely Hopper’s Chevy Blazer!’ screamed another.

Netflix declined to comment.

Last week, actor David Harbour called up Matt and Ross Duffer to demand answers about Hopper’s whereabouts live on Late Night With Seth Meyers.

‘Am I dead? Is Hopper dead?’ David asked.

‘I mean, we’re still figuring it out, David,’ Ross replied.

‘You guys are a ton of help. Really wonderful work. Good luck with season four,’ David replied.

We’ve got our fingers crossed that Hopper will be making a comeback in some way shape or form.

Stranger Things is available to stream on Netflix.
